text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ACSB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ACSB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $26$.
The length of the line $AE$ is $24$.
The length of the line $BS$ is $22$.
The point $E$ lies on the line $BS$.
The line $AE$ is perpendicular to the line $EB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BS$, and $CS$, forming the parallelogram $ACSB$.
The lines $AE$ and $BE$ form a right angle at point $E$.
